attributes.action: Reform Our Unfair Tax System and abolish Tax Loopholes
attributes.additional_details: The UK System has so many Tax Loopholes that Millionaires can use the system to pay less tax than workers paying PAYE on low incomes. Why can't the Coalition prove that 'We are all in this together' by abolishing Tax Loopholes and making Tax-Payer's Tax Returns more open. All Legislators should publish their full Tax Returns online to show that they don't have vested interests in Tax Loopholes.
